message: Let's split fairly, Bob.  A slight advantage for me in this round means you'll be in a stronger position if we have to negotiate further.
Alice, it's my turn now.  I'm proposing the same split, but with me getting the slight advantage this time.  Think carefully, the value decreases with each round!

Bob, it's clear we both want a larger share.  But let's be realistic - this back and forth is costing us both money! I propose a fair 50/50 split. Take it before inflation eats away at our potential gains!
